response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. After careful consideration of its value and potential impact on your business, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset that is worth $800,000 to you, at a significant discount. We believe this offer presents a unique chance for both parties to benefit. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
